definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are so funny.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈那些西方人酸溜溜的评论真是好笑。

sentences.english: The tree that blue pursuit, xing sourest feeling.
sentences.chinese: 大树得知邢蓝追求，感觉酸溜溜。

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are so funny.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈哪些西方人酸溜溜地评论真是好笑。

sentences.english: You look as sour as a vinegar jug.
sentences.chinese: 你看起来就像一缸醋一样酸溜溜的。

sentences.english: Hahah comment from occidentals jelous people are sofu y.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈哈那些西方人酸溜溜的评论真是好笑。

sentences.english: Eat teeth and bold, how also acid is generated.
sentences.chinese: 吃的牙齿和胃酸溜溜的，怎么也无处排解。

sentences.english: Some sort of sour fish. Eel, I think.
sentences.chinese: 一种什么酸溜溜的鱼，我想大概是鳗鲡吧。

definition: variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
see 酸不溜丟|酸不溜丢[suan1 bu5 liu1 diu1]
lit. to take joy in calamity and delight in disaster (idiom); fig. to rejoice in other people's misfortune/Schadenfreude
variant of 憤憤|愤愤[fen4 fen4]
